channel.title: C.V. on Computing
channel.description: Recent content in C.V. on Computing

item.title: C.V.
item.description: Rita-Josy Haddoub (b.1996) is a new media artist and creative coder. Originally from Beirut, Lebanon. Currently Based in Denmark. Education MA Media Arts and Cultures Erasmus+ Mundus Joint Masters Scholarship 2022 - 2024 BSc Digital Arts Computing with First Class Honours Goldsmiths, University of London 2017 - 2020 Publications Friendred: Moving Photon Preview Theatrical sci-art show review. Jan 4, 2022 Seimsa Magazine. Exhibitions Computational Arabic an exhibition at Constant vitrine Brussels, Belgium.
